TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewComboBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

span.span: Represents a column of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于逻辑承载单元格的专用类型, 这些单元使用户能够从选项列表中选择值。 The class is a specialized type of used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices. 在中, 每个都与它相交。 A has an associated in every that intersects it. 可以通过设置单元属性来手动填充单元格。You can populate the cells manually by setting their properties. 或者, 可以将列绑定到属性指示的数据源。Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the property. 如果绑定到数据库表, 则将列属性设置为表中的列的名称。 If the is bound to a database table, set the column property to the name of a column in the table. 如果绑定到对象的集合, 则将属性设置为对象属性的名称。 If the is bound to a collection of objects, set the property to the name of an object property. 您可以通过向集合添加值, 手动填充列下拉列表。You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the collection. 或者, 您可以通过设置列属性将下拉列表绑定到其自己的数据源。Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column property. 如果值是某个集合中的对象或数据库表中的记录, 则还必须设置和属性。If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the and properties. 属性指示哪个对象属性或数据库列提供下拉列表中显示的值。The property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list. 属性指示用于设置单元属性的对象属性或数据库列。 The property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell property. 一种典型方案是将控件绑定到父数据库表, 并将下拉列表绑定到相关的子表。One typical scenario is to bind the control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table. 例如 , 您可以将控件绑定到一个`Orders`包含`Products` `ProductID`列的表, 并将 column 属性设置为包含`ProductID`列和`ProductName`列的表。For example, you might bind the control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns. 在这种情况下, 您可以将 "列" 属性设置为 "ProductID" 以填充`Orders.ProductID`该列的单元值。In this case, you would set the column property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column. 但是, 若要在单元和下拉列表中显示实际产品名称, 则可以通过`Products` 将属性设置为 "ProductID" 并将属性设置为 "ProductName", 将这些值映射到表。However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the property to "ProductID" and the property to "ProductName". 下拉列表值 (或由属性指示的值) 必须包含实际单元值, 否则控件将引发异常。The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the property) must include the actual cell values or the control will throw an exception. 设置列 、 和属性会自动设置列中所有单元格 (包括) 的相应属性。Setting the column , , and properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the . 若要覆盖特定单元的这些属性值, 请先设置列属性, 然后设置单元属性。To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties. 与控件不同 , 不具有和属性。 Unlike the control, the does not have and properties. 相反, 从下拉列表中选择一个值将设置该单元属性。Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell property. 此列类型的默认排序模式为。The default sort mode for this column type is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#0)]

para.span: 当从派生类派生并向其添加新属性时, 请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的方法, 以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数将此属性初始化为新创建的。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列现有单元的用户界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改仅在重新生成列后才明显 (例如, 通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性, 该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自[了如何:操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中的列。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataSource { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DataSource : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置填充组合框的选项的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
An object that represents a data source.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或属性指定在何处检索组合框下拉列表中显示的选择数据。The or properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list. 使用属性时, 如果必须从非默认属性或列中提取数据, 则必须将属性设置为非默认属性或列的名称。When using the property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column. 如果将 属性设置为字符串数组, 则和不需要设置, 因为数组中的每个字符串都将用于值和显示。 If the property is set to a string array, then and do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性, 并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 属性用于在组合框中填充选择的标题。The property is used to populate the combo box with a selection of titles. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

member this.DisplayMember : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，此字符串指定要从其中检索在组合框中显示的字符串的属性或列。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.

value.span: ，它指定在 属性中所指定数据源中的属性或列的名称。

span.span: A that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the property.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的列中存储的值的数据是从获取的。The data for the values stored in a column of objects is obtained from the . 如果此数据来自非默认属性或列, 则必须将属性设置为必需的属性名称或列名称。If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the property must be set to the necessary property name or column name. 如果单元值为对用户不可见的内部值, 则使用和将内部单元值映射到用户可查看值。If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use and to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values. 当属性设置为字符串数组时 , 无需设置属性, 因为数组中的每个字符串都将用作有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。 When the property is set to a string array, the property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性, 并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助输入标题列的数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in data entry of the title column. 设置为负责包含用户可查看文本的属性名称。 is set to the property name responsible for containing the user-viewable text. 在此示例中, 将设置为与相同的值, 因为无需映射。In this example, the is set to the same value as because no mapping is necessary. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle DisplayStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定没有编辑时组合框的显示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.

value.span: 值，它指示组合框的外观。

span.span: A value indicating the combo box appearance.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当列中的单元格不处于编辑模式时, 它会影响其外观, 而不管它们是否为只读。The property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only. 当单元格处于编辑模式时, 它将始终类似于控件。When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 如果属性值为`false`, 则该属性将影响列中的所有单元格; 否则, 属性仅影响当前单元格。 If the property value is `false`, the property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the property affects only the current cell. 单元格中的下拉箭头的行为和外观由属性指示。The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the property. 若要在鼠标指针位于单元格上时启用单元格突出显示, 则必须将属性设置为, 并将属性设置为。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the property to and the property to . 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性, 并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value of the property is .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性值为`false`, 则该属性将影响列中的所有单元格; 否则, 属性仅影响当前单元格。 If the property value is `false`, the property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the property affects only the current cell. 当列中的单元格不处于编辑模式时, 它会影响其外观, 而不管它们是否为只读。The property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only. 当单元格处于编辑模式时, 它将始终类似于控件。When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性, 并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于成员的属性。This property corresponds to the property of the member. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置列的单元格的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.

value.span: 值，它指示单元格的外观。

span.span: A value indicating the cell appearance.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性影响此列中单元格的下拉箭头的行为和外观。The property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column. 从 .NET Framework 4.6 开始, 当属性设置`Popup`为`Flat`时, 当 app.config 文件包含以下项时, 根据系统 DPI 设置调整下拉箭头的大小:Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, when the property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` 若要在鼠标指针位于单元格上时启用单元格突出显示, 则必须将属性设置为, 并将属性设置为。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the property to and the property to . 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性, 并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取用作组合框中选项的对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
An that represents the selections in the combo boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回 属性返回的的属性的值。This property returns the value of the property of the returned by the property. 或属性用于填充组合框的选项。The or properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes. 如果将字符串添加到, 则不需要设置和属性, 因为添加的每个字符串都将用于值和显示。If strings are added to , then the and properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display. > [!NOTE] > 不支持使用具有相同显示值的多个项。 does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values. 如果设置了属性, 则不能使用。If the property is set, then cannot be used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 属性用于在组合框下拉列表中填充选择的标题。The property is used to populate the combo box drop-down list with a selection of titles. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置列的单元格中下拉列表的最大项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.

value.span: 下拉列表的最大项数，范围从 1 到 100。

span.span: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
The default is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，此字符串指定要从其中获取与下拉列表的选项对应的值的属性或列。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.

value.span: ，它指定在 属性中使用的属性或列的名称。

span.span: A that specifies the name of a property or column used in the property.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 与的关系的详细信息, 请参阅。See for more information about its relationship with . 当属性设置为字符串数组时 , 无需设置属性, 因为数组中的每个字符串都将用作有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。 When the property is set to a string array, the property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性, 并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助在`TitleOfCourtesy`列中输入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic.
